summary: MY DODGE JOURNEY HAS RUN GREAT FOR A FEW YEARS NOW IT IS HAVING A HARD TIME STARTING.  I HAVE ALREADY REPLACED THE BATTERY AND SEVERAL FUSES WITH NO LUCK.  IT ALSO SEEMS TO LOOSE POWER AND HAVE A LOUD TAPPING NOISE IN THE ENGINE COMPARTMENT WHEN IT IS COLD.  I HAVE TAKEN IN THE CAR TO MY MECHANIC TO GET THE TAPPING CHECKED WE CHANGE OIL (EVEN WHEN IT DOES NOT NEED IT)  AND THE NOISE WILL GO A WAY.  SO IN A SUMMARY, I AHVE A NO STARTING, PHANTOM TAPPING NOISE DODGE JOIRNEY.
